"The owner Kirk and his staff Denise and David are great to work with." "Great communication and hard work from this company." "And now that I posted about poor owners response, they cancel my service." swimming pool water feature repairs

We paid 27,000 for the repair of my pool. It took a year they didn’t finish the work so I had to hire Blue Sky pool to finish. They finished within a week. I had my pool changed to salt water. He did that in a day. We can’t be happier. He also automated everything so now we don’t have any worries at all. We can’t thank him enough.

Sky Blue Pools are simply amazing! They are quick, responsive, and absolute pros! We had a leak and they promptly fixed the issue and went above and beyond with the work that was done! They even fixed the plumbing that a prior company did … More

DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!! Horrible service. We are considered a new and current customer. Since their first visit our pool equipment has stopped working properly. Everything was working fine until we started using them. Dakota was late or … More
